name: utils
description: Shared interfaces and methods between server and app environments.

scripts.build: tsc && cp package.json dist && cd dist && npm pack && mv *.tgz ../utils.tgz
scripts.installFunctions: cd ../functions && mkdir -p src/utils/ && mv ../utils/*.tgz src/utils/ && npm i ./src/utils/*.tgz && rm package-lock.json
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run installApp && npm run installFunctions
